front.title: IEEE Standard for Virtual Bridged Local Area Networks - Corrigendum 1: Technical and Editorial Corrections

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment to IEEE 802.1Q,1998 Edition is intended to document maintenance items identified in the text of IEEE Std 802.1Q,1998 Edition.IEEE Std 802.1u-2001 identifies any proposed changes to IEEE Std 802.1Q,1998 Edition that have arisen as a consequence of maintenance activity.The changes are documented in the usual form for an amendment to IEEE 802 standards;i.e.,as an explicit set of editing instructions that,if correctly applied to the text of IEEE Std 802.1Q,1998 Edition,will create a corrected document.
